item.title: 人工智能编码领导者 Cursor 收购帮助初创企业招聘人才的公司
item.description: Cursor 是一家快速发展的人工智能编码初创公司，它正在收购一家曾帮助 OpenAI 等领先人工智能公司开展招聘工作的公司，这是科技行业人才争夺战日趋激烈的最新迹象。【原文：Cursor, a fast-growing artificial intelligence coding startup, is buying a firm that has helped support leading AI companies like OpenAI in their own recruiting efforts, the latest sign of an increasingly fierce talent war in the technology industry.】

item.title: 加拿大顶级养老金在收益不均后重整增长型股权投资
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）正在对一项专注于高增长公司的私募股权投资战略进行改革，因为该战略取得的成果喜忧参半。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board is revamping a private equity strategy that focuses on high-growth companies after getting mixed results in the strategy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Fireblocks 正在为回购员工持股筹集资金进行谈判
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，由红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）和Coatue管理公司（Coatue Management）支持的加密基础设施公司Fireblocks Inc.【原文：Fireblocks Inc., the crypto infrastructure company backed by Sequoia Capital and Coatue Management, is in talks to raise money to buy back shares from employees, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Desmarais 家族的电力公司现金堆积，寻求更多交易
item.description: 加拿大电力公司（Power Corp. of Canada）公布了强劲的收益，并表示正在寻找更多的收购机会，公司股价因此飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：Shares of Power Corp. of Canada surged to a record after the company posted strong earnings and said it’s on the hunt for more acquisitions.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称正努力完成塞内加尔债务审查
item.description: 国际货币基金组织正在对塞内加尔的债务进行审查，谈判将在未来几周内继续进行。【原文：The International Monetary Fund is working on its review of Senegal’s debt and negotiations will continue in the coming weeks.】

item.title: 特斯拉正努力增加苹果 CarPlay 功能，以提高汽车销量
item.description: 据知情人士透露，特斯拉公司正在为其汽车开发对苹果公司 CarPlay 系统的支持，努力增加客户要求最高的功能之一。【原文：Tesla Inc. is developing support for Apple Inc.’s CarPlay system in its vehicles, according to people with knowledge of the matter, working to add one of the most highly requested features by customers.】

item.title: 德国将禁止华为参与未来 6G 网络建设以维护主权
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-默茨（Friedrich Merz）表示，出于安全考虑，华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz said Chinese suppliers such as Huawei Technologies Co. will be excluded from the country’s future telecommunication networks on security grounds as he pushes for more digital sovereignty.】

item.title: 供应激增后，债券 "疯狂 "交易速度刷新纪录
item.description: 受政府销售强劲以及与关税和利率变动相关的一阵波动的推动，投资者和交易商今年交易市政债券的速度创下新高。【原文：Investors and dealers are trading municipal bonds at a record pace this year, driven by strong government sales and a burst of volatility tied to tariffs and interest rate moves.】

item.title: 雷普索尔考虑将价值 190 亿美元的上游部门与 APA 合并
item.description: 知情人士透露，雷普索尔公司（Repsol SA）正在考虑将其上游部门与包括美国能源生产商 APA 公司在内的潜在合作伙伴进行反向合并，同时寻求在纽约上市的途径。【原文：Repsol SA is considering a reverse merger of its upstream unit with potential partners including US energy producer APA Corp., people with knowledge of the matter said, as it seeks ways to list the business in New York.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告阿根廷需要加快积累外汇储备
item.description: 国际货币基金组织的工作人员敦促哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）领导的阿根廷政府加快建立外汇储备，这是该国家与国际货币基金组织达成的 200 亿美元协议的一部分。【原文：International Monetary Fund staff urged Javier Milei’s government in Argentina to build up its foreign reserves faster as part of the nation’s $20 billion agreement with the lender.】

item.title: 新任首席执行官上任后，Verizon 将裁员多达 1.5 万人
item.description: 据熟悉这家无线运营商计划的人士透露，威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is discussing plans to announce job cuts across the company next week, according to people familiar with the wireless carrier’s plans, a major step in a transformation led by new Chief Executive Officer Dan Schulman.】

item.title: 世界银行计划出资 13.5 亿美元促进肯尼亚住房建设
item.description: 世界银行计划为肯尼亚筹集 13.5 亿美元，以增加购房者获得更便宜抵押贷款的机会，缩小肯尼亚的住房赤字。【原文：The World Bank plans to mobilize $1.35 billion for Kenya to increase access to cheaper mortgages for home buyers and narrow the nation’s housing deficit.】

item.title: 欧盟寻求扩大市场监督机构的直接监督权
item.description: 根据欧盟官员在下月宣布之前分发的计划草案，欧洲市场监管部门将获得更多权力，直接监督 "重要的 "清算所、存管机构和交易场所，以及加密货币公司。【原文：Europe’s markets watchdog will get more power to directly oversee “significant” clearing houses, depositories and trading venues, as well as crypto firms, according to draft plans circulated by European Union officials ahead of an announcement next month.】

item.title: 阿波罗和 KKR 在对受压私人贷款进行估值时发现了创纪录的巨大差距
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.由 Future Standard 和 KKR & Co.共同管理的竞争对手基金给出了截然不同的评估：91 美分。【原文：An Apollo Global Management Inc. private credit fund deemed a loan to Medallia Inc. worth 77 cents on the dollar, a level typically considered distressed. A rival fund co-managed by Future Standard and KKR & Co. offered a very different assessment: 91 cents.】

item.title: 美国股市下滑，政府重新开放，数据仍被推迟
item.description: 美国股市开盘下跌，有望结束四连涨，原因是尽管政府停摆已经结束，但投资者仍在为缺乏美国经济数据而苦恼。【原文：US equities dropped at the open, poised to snap a four-session winning streak, as investors continue to grapple with a lack of US economic data despite the end of the government shutdown.】

item.title: 哈塞特称 10 月份就业报告将跳过失业率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的最高经济顾问周四表示，10 月份的就业报告将在不显示失业率的情况下发布。【原文：The October jobs report will be released without a reading of the unemployment rate, President Donald Trump’s top economic adviser said Thursday.】

item.title: OnePlus 新款两日电池续航手机因美国政府关门而推迟上市
item.description:
OnePlus 15 拥有顶级游戏性能，并可作为通用遥控器控制电视。【原文：

The OnePlus 15 has top-tier gaming performance and can control TVs as a universal remote.

】

item.title: 直径公司募集 45 亿美元信贷基金押注错位经营
item.description: 信贷投资公司 Diameter Capital Partners 为其最新基金募集了 45 亿美元，旨在抓住市场混乱的机会。【原文：Credit investment firm Diameter Capital Partners has raised $4.5 billion for its latest fund aiming to seize on market dislocations.】

item.title: 加密资产管理公司灰度在 IPO 文件中显示收入下降
item.description: 灰度投资公司（Grayscale Investments Inc.【原文：Grayscale Investments Inc. filed publicly for an initial public offering, the latest cryptocurrency-linked company to test public markets under an administration more open to digital assets.】

item.title: 今年暴涨 3,600% 的土耳其经纪公司任命埃尔多安顾问为董事会成员
item.description: 总部位于伊斯坦布尔的经纪公司 Tera Yatirim Menkul Degerler AS 是土耳其今年表现最好的股票，该公司任命雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统的一位顾问为董事会成员。【原文：Tera Yatirim Menkul Degerler AS, an Istanbul-based brokerage that’s Turkey’s best-performing stock this year, appointed one of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s advisers to its board.】

item.title: 格林称英格兰银行不能忽视特朗普式威胁
item.description: 英国央行决策者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）警告说，在民粹主义领袖奈杰尔-法拉奇（Nigel Farage）兜售如果他掌权将撤换英国央行行长之后，美联储独立性面临的政治压力可能会蔓延到英国。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene warned that mounting political pressure on the Federal Reserve’s independence could spill over to the UK, after populist leader Nigel Farage touted replacing the BOE governor if he took power.】

item.title: 泰国在旅游业反弹后对午后禁酒令做出改变
item.description: 泰国在禁酒令生效仅几天后就撤销了禁酒令，游客和当地居民又可以享受午后饮酒的乐趣了。【原文：Tourists and local residents will be able to enjoy their afternoon drinks again after Thailand reversed its alcohol ban just days after the restrictions took effect.】

item.title: Blackstone 旗下 Copeland 秘密申请美国 IPO
item.description: Blackstone 旗下的谷轮公司已秘密提交首次公开募股申请，为该工业公司在 2026 年首次出售股份做好准备，预计这将是繁忙的一年。【原文：Blackstone Inc.-owned Copeland has filed confidentially for an initial public offering, setting the industrial company up for a first-time share sale in 2026, which is anticipated to be a busy year.】

item.title: 南苏丹要求原油生产商预付 25 亿美元货款
item.description: 南苏丹要求原油生产商预付总计 25 亿美元的款项，并打算通过未来的产量来偿还，而这些产量本应归属于马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd）。【原文：South Sudan is asking crude producers for a total pre-payment of $2.5 billion, which it intends to refund through future production that would have been entitled to Petroliam Nasional Bhd.】

item.title: Blackstone 在首次发行 220 亿美元后推出高级借贷基金
item.description: 黑石集团（Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. has begun reaching out to investors to raise money for the second series of its senior direct-lending fund strategy, people with knowledge of the matter said, after the first amassed $22 billion just over a year ago.】

item.title: 调查人员全面解除 Telegram 首席执行官的法国旅行禁令
item.description: Telegram 亿万富翁首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）的旅行禁令已被法国当局完全解除，因为法国当局正在调查他的信息平台。【原文：Telegram billionaire Chief Executive Officer Pavel Durov’s travel ban has been fully lifted by French authorities investigating him over his messaging platform.】

item.title: 创始人基金支持为管道工和屋顶工带来人工智能的初创公司
item.description: 多年来，大公司一直在各种可能的产品中植入人工智能软件。现在，Founders Fund 正在支持一家初创公司，该公司也希望帮助小型企业使用人工智能技术。【原文：Large companies have been stuffing artificial intelligence software into every possible product for years. Now, Founders Fund is backing a startup that wants to help small businesses use the technology, too.】

item.title: 优步（Uber）让乘客预订前往滑雪胜地的行程，以此作为优步推广活动的一部分
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is expanding the availability of its reserved rides option to include popular ski destinations, part of a larger effort to lure wealthy consumers toward more premium services.】

item.title: 纽约银行为稳定币发行商推出新货币市场基金
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（Bank New York Mellon Corp）正在为需要遵守最近签署的美国稳定币法律的稳定币发行商推出一款货币市场基金。【原文：The Bank of New York Mellon Corp. is launching a money-market fund tailored to issuers of stablecoins who need to comply with a recently signed US stablecoin law.】

item.title: MoonPay 加入稳定币热潮，推出发行业务
item.description: 加密支付公司 MoonPay Inc. 将开始代表客户发行和管理稳定币，因为在美国立法之后，与美元挂钩的代币需求激增。【原文：Crypto payments firm MoonPay Inc. will start issuing and managing stablecoins on behalf of clients, as demand for dollar-pegged tokens has soared in the wake of US legislation.】
